member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Environment#Configuration#Recommended Apps.InsertApp(Guid,Integer,Text[250],Text[250],Text[250],Text[2048],Enum::System#Environment#Configuration#App Recommended By,Text):Boolean
member.param: The identifier for the app.
The ID used to display apps in ascending order on the Recommended Apps page.
The app name.
The app publisher.
The short description of the app that is displayed on the Recommended Apps page.
The long description of the app that is displayed on the Recommended Apps page.
The entity that is recommending the app.
The AppSource URL of the app.
member.returns: True if the app was successfully inserted; otherwise, false.

The ID used to display apps in ascending order on the Recommended Apps page.
The app name.
The app publisher.
The short description of the app that is displayed on the Recommended Apps page.
The long description of the app that is displayed on the Recommended Apps page.
The entity that is recommending the app.
The AppSource URL of the app.
member.returns: True if the app was successfully retrieved; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Environment#Configuration#Recommended Apps.RefreshImage(Guid):Boolean
member.summary: Download the app's logo from AppSource. This is useful when the logo is changed.
member.param: The identifier for the app.
member.returns: True if the app's logo was successfully updated; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Environment#Configuration#Recommended Apps.DeleteApp(Guid):Boolean
